title: Report: Dave Brailsford Relinquishes Ineos Grenadiers’ Role, with Manchester United Now the Priority
content:
End of an era as Team Sky co-founder steps away from team principal spot, but he will still exert influence.

Read the full article at Report: Dave Brailsford Relinquishes Ineos Grenadiers’ Role, with Manchester United Now the Priority on Velo.
author: sstokes
